mapper.select: SELECT TASK.TENANT_ID, TASK.INSTRUCTION_DOC_ID, TASK.INSTRUCTION_ID, TASK.TASK_STATUS, TASK.INSTRUCTION_DOC_TYPE, TASK.MATERIAL_ID, TASK.TASK_QTY, TASK.EXECUTE_QTY, TASK.CREATION_DATE, TASK.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, ms.SUPPLIER_CODE, ms.SUPPLIER_NAME, attr.ATTR_VALUE urgent_flag, mm.MATERIAL_CODE, mm.MATERIAL_NAME, mu.UOM_CODE, attr2.ATTR_VALUE ACTUAL_RECEIVE_QTY, attr3.ATTR_VALUE uai_flag FROM WMS_PUT_IN_STORAGE_TASK TASK LEFT JOIN mt_instruction_doc mid ON mid.INSTRUCTION_DOC_ID = TASK.instruction_doc_id LEFT JOIN mt_instruction_doc_attr attr ON attr.INSTRUCTION_DOC_ID = mid.INSTRUCTION_DOC_ID AND attr.ATTR_NAME = 'URGENT_FLAG' LEFT JOIN mt_supplier ms ON mid.SUPPLIER_ID = ms.SUPPLIER_ID LEFT JOIN mt_instruction mi ON mi.INSTRUCTION_ID = TASK.instruction_id LEFT JOIN mt_instruction_attr attr2 ON attr2.INSTRUCTION_ID = mi.INSTRUCTION_ID AND attr2.ATTR_NAME = 'ACTUAL_RECEIVED_QTY' LEFT JOIN mt_instruction_attr attr3 ON attr3.INSTRUCTION_ID = mi.INSTRUCTION_ID AND attr3.ATTR_NAME = 'UAI_FLAG' LEFT JOIN mt_material mm ON mi.MATERIAL_ID = mm.MATERIAL_ID LEFT JOIN mt_uom mu ON mu.UOM_ID = mi.UOM_ID WHERE TASK.INSTRUCTION_DOC_TYPE = 'DELIVERY_DOC' AND TASK.TASK_STATUS IN ('STOCK_PENDING','STOCKING') AND TASK.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} ORDER BY TASK.CREATION_DATE DESC, ms.SUPPLIER_CODE ASC, mm.MATERIAL_CODE ASC

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(TASK.execute_qty), 0 ) AS sumStoragedMonth, IFNULL( CEILING( (SUM( UNIX_TIMESTAMP( TASK.last_update_date ) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP( TASK.creation_date ) ) / COUNT( 1 ))/60 ), 0 ) AS avgTimeStoraged FROM WMS_PUT_IN_STORAGE_TASK TASK WHERE TASK.INSTRUCTION_DOC_TYPE = 'DELIVERY_DOC' AND TASK.TASK_STATUS IN ( 'STOCKING', 'STOCKED' ) AND TASK.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TASK.last_update_date >= #{monthTimeFrom} AND TASK.last_update_date <= #{monthTimeTo}
